title: Live Stream a Game to a Mobile App
description: A team wants to live stream their game directly to their official mobile app.

tasks.description: Set up a new live stream event in the digital content platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the event and gets a unique stream key.

tasks.description: Configure the streaming encoder with the correct stream key and settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the on-site production team has the correct configuration.

tasks.description: Start the stream and monitor its health and quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts the stream and confirms it is playing correctly in the mobile app.
